title: Camera
description: A camera's projection.  A node **MAY** reference a camera to apply a transform to place the camera in the scene.

orthographic.description: An orthographic camera containing properties to create an orthographic projection matrix. This property **MUST NOT** be defined when `perspective` is defined.

perspective.description: A perspective camera containing properties to create a perspective projection matrix. This property **MUST NOT** be defined when `orthographic` is defined.

type.description: Specifies if the camera uses a perspective or orthographic projection.
type.gltf_detailedDescription: Specifies if the camera uses a perspective or orthographic projection.  Based on this, either the camera's `perspective` or `orthographic` property **MUST** be defined.
